## Part 1

```{r}
input <- readLines("test_input.txt")
input_split <- strsplit(input, "")
start <- which(input_split[[1]] == "S")
input_split[[2]][start] <- "|"
running_total <- 0
for (i in 2:(length(input_split) - 1)) {
  beams <- grep("\\|", input_split[[i]])
  splitters <- grep("\\^", input_split[[i+1]])
  running_total <- running_total + sum(splitters %in% beams)
  next_beams <- c(splitters - 1, splitters + 1)
  next_beams <- unique(next_beams[which(!(next_beams %in% splitters))])
  input_split[[i+1]][next_beams] <- "|"
  if (i == length(input_split) - 1) {
    break
  }
  input_split[[i+2]][next_beams] <- "|"
}
```
